2059640.name: Gosh A Ghost Demo
2059640.description:
Gosh A Ghost is an online multiplayer action game set in a haunted mansion. Outsmart ghosts with magical spells and traps. The ghost hunter with the most points wins the round!

Items can be altered, combined and used in inventive ways. Using items is the key to vanquishing ghosts. A wine bottle can be used to trap ghosts. Matches used to light candles or start a fire. There are many ways to use items!

Set in a sixties mansion, bright garish colors awash the walls and furniture. Creepy crawlies in every corner are living quite happily alongside the ghosts. Hidden within the rooms are many secrets. Special actions will unlock areas, for example, pulling on a book or twisting the head of a statue.

Choose to use a keyboard to type actions or stick with a mouse to point and click. Both systems work seamlessly alongside each other.

Have you got what it takes to become the greatest ghost hunter the world has ever seen?
2059640.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
